mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6, 10.14.6, 10.15.5, 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM macOS 10.14 and later requires Metal API: Version 1 macOS 10.13 requires OpenGL: Version 2.1
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: Football Manager 2021 Touch - Attribute Masking

package_groups.title: Buy Football Manager 2021 Touch - Attribute Masking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (Update 1903/May 2019 or later) – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Make certain player attributes (or in some cases all) invisible.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
